verses.verse: And he <S%G2476>stood<s%> on the <S%G285>sand<s%> of the <S%G2281>seashore.<s%> And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G305>coming<s%> up out of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> and <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads,<s%> and on his <S%G2768>horns<s%> [were] <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G1238>diadems,<s%> and on his <S%G2776>heads<s%> [were] <S%G988>blasphemous<s%> <S%G3686>names.<s%>

And the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G3708>saw<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3917>leopard,<s%> and his <S%G4228>feet<s%> were <S%G5613>like<s%> [those] of a <S%G715>bear,<s%> and his <S%G4750>mouth<s%> like the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of a <S%G3023>lion.<s%> And the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> him his <S%G1411>power<s%> and his <S%G2362>throne<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1849>authority.<s%>

And [I saw] <S%G1520>one<s%> of his <S%G2776>heads<s%> as <S%G5613>if<s%> it had been <S%G4969>slain,<s%> and his <S%G2288>fatal<s%> <S%G4127>wound<s%> was <S%G2323>healed.<s%> And the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> was <S%G2296>amazed<s%> [and followed] <S%G3694>after<s%> the <S%G2342>beast;<s%>

and they <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> his <S%G1849>authority<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast;<s%> and they <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> and <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4170>wage<s%> <S%G4170>war<s%> with him?"

And there was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him a <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G3173>arrogant<s%> words and <S%G988>blasphemies;<s%> and <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G4160>act<s%> for forty-two <S%G3376>months<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him.

And he <S%G455>opened<s%> his <S%G4750>mouth<s%> in <S%G988>blasphemies<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G987>blaspheme<s%> His <S%G3686>name<s%> and His <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> [that is], <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4637>dwell<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And it was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> with the <S%G40>saints<s%> and to <S%G3528>overcome<s%> them; and <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%> and <S%G2992>people<s%> and <S%G1100>tongue<s%> and <S%G1484>nation<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him.

And <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> will <S%G4352>worship<s%> him, [everyone] <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> has not been <S%G1125>written<s%> from the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> in the <S%G975>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> who has been <S%G4969>slain.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> [is destined] for <S%G161>captivity,<s%> to <S%G161>captivity<s%> he <S%G5217>goes;<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G615>kills<s%> with the <S%G3162>sword,<s%> with the <S%G3162>sword<s%> he <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G615>killed.<s%> <S%G5602>Here<s%> is the <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> and the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G305>coming<s%> up out of the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G721>lamb,<s%> and he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> as a <S%G1404>dragon.<s%>

And he <S%G4160>exercises<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1849>authority<s%> of the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%> in his <S%G1799>presence.<s%> And he <S%G4160>makes<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> in it to <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2288>fatal<s%> <S%G4127>wound<s%> was <S%G2323>healed.<s%>

And he <S%G4160>performs<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>signs,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that he <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G4160>makes<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> to the <S%G1093>earth<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>

And he <S%G4105>deceives<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> it was <S%G1325>given<s%> him to <S%G4160>perform<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3004>telling<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> an <S%G1504>image<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G4127>wound<s%> of the <S%G3162>sword<s%> and has come to <S%G2198>life.<s%>

And there was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4151>breath<s%> to the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> that the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> might <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> and <S%G4160>cause<s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> as do not <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> to be <S%G615>killed.<s%>

And he <S%G4160>causes<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> the <S%G3398>small<s%> and the <S%G3173>great,<s%> and the <S%G4145>rich<s%> and the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> and the <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G1658>men<s%> and the <S%G1401>slaves,<s%> to be <S%G1325>given<s%> a <S%G5480>mark<s%> on their <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> on their <S%G3359>forehead,<s%>

and [he provides] that <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> should be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G4453>sell,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> the one who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G5480>mark,<s%> [either] the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of his <S%G3686>name.<s%>

<S%G5602>Here<s%> is <S%G4678>wisdom.<s%> Let him who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3563>understanding<s%> <S%G5585>calculate<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> for the <S%G706>number<s%> is that of a <S%G444>man;<s%> and his <S%G706>number<s%> is <S%G1812>six<s%> <S%G1812>hundred<s%> and sixty-six.
